mean_cn: v. 渗入，潜入 (某地方或组织)
mean_en: to secretly enter or join (something, such as a group or an organization) in order to get information or do harm
sentence: The spy secretly infiltrated the headquarters of the organization.
sentence_trans: 一个特工秘密地潜入了这个组织的总部。
word_etyma: in进 + filtr过滤 + ate做，造成 → 渗透
